channel.title: Hybrid Pvp Corp and TD
channel.description:
Hello everyone..
I am calling to moparscape members who know how to fix this, and maybe wanna TV.
I have the source and client for Hybrid Pvp, which is a PI base. As some people have posted here under server help, it has a couple GWD and Other boss bugs. The problem im having today is knowing how to fix Corp and Tormented Demon. When i tele to TD, their is 3 of them. They do not attack, and i can not attack them. When i teleport to corp, he attacks me, but yet again, i cannot attack him. When i click the " attack " Option, my guy moves 1 step in a direction, and does not attack.
Can anybody help me? Even Teamview me?
Thanks in advance.
